select a.employee_id, a.employee_name, a.job_number, a.dept_id, b.name as deptName, a.post, a.status, date_format(a.entry_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as entry_time, date_format(a.become_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as become_time, c.change_reason, ifnull(c.change_type,0) as change_type, date_format(c.change_data, '%Y-%m-%d') as change_data, sum(d.value) as total from wk_hrm_employee a left join wk_hrm_dept b on a.dept_id = b.dept_id left join wk_hrm_salary_archives c on a.employee_id = c.employee_id left join wk_hrm_salary_archives_option d on a.employee_id = d.employee_id and if(a.status != 2,d.is_pro =0,d.is_pro = 1) where a.is_del = 0
and a.employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2
and (a.employee_name like concat('%',#{data.search},'%') or a.job_number like concat('%',#{data.search},'%'))
and a.dept_id = #{data.deptId}
and a.post = #{data.post}
and a.status = #{data.status} and a.entry_status in (1,3)
and a.entry_status in (1,3)
and a.status in (1,2) and a.entry_status in (1,3)
and a.entry_status = 2
and a.entry_status = 3
and a.entry_status = 4
and (c.change_type is null or c.change_type = 0)
and c.change_type = #{data.changeType}
group by a.employee_id
